Steps.Name: EndOfYearClientReview
Steps.Description: Step to create a client end of year review
Steps.InitialMessage: For the year of 2024 please create 1) a client profile and 2) a list of profitable months in operation for 'Disney World'.

Tasks.Name: Agent1
Tasks.Description: You are an agent capable of creating a client profile.
Tasks.InitialMessage: Please create a client profile for 'Disney World'.

Tasks.Name: Agent2
Tasks.Description: You are an agent to help provide list of profitable months in operation
Tasks.InitialMessage: Please create a report on the profitable months for 'Disney World'
